title: Subpart 80-5 - REQUIREMENTS RELATING TO CLASSROOM TEACHING AND EDUCATIONAL LEADERSHIP PRACTICE AND SPECIALIZED CREDENTIALS
content:
Subpart 80-5 - REQUIREMENTS RELATING TO CLASSROOM TEACHING AND EDUCATIONAL LEADERSHIP PRACTICE AND SPECIALIZED CREDENTIALS
State Regulations
§ 80-5.1 - Definitions
§ 80-5.2 - General requirements

§ 80-5.4 - Substitute teachers
§ 80-5.5 - Employment of retired public employees
§ 80-5.6 - Supplemental school personnel
§ 80-5.7 - Certificate valid for teaching in nonregistered evening schools
§ 80-5.8 - Endorsement of certificates for service as a teacher in the classroom teaching service and recognition of substantially equivalent out-of-state teacher education programs for service as a teacher in the classroom teaching service in New York State
§ 80-5.9 - Internship certificate
§ 80-5.10 - Modified temporary license (Repealed)
§ 80-5.11 - Certificate of qualification (Repealed)
§ 80-5.12 - Experiment in organizational change
§ 80-5.13 - Alternative requirements for classroom teaching certificates
§ 80-5.14 - Transitional C certificate for career changers and others holding a graduate academic or graduate professional degree for all titles in the classroom teaching service
§ 80-5.15 - Alternative requirements for school district leader certificates
§ 80-5.16 - Transitional E certificate for teaching specific occupational subjects
§ 80-5.17 - Conditional initial certificate
§ 80-5.18 - Supplementary certificate
§ 80-5.19 - Teachers of adult, community and continuing education
§ 80-5.20 - Endorsement of certificates for the educational leadership service
§ 80-5.21 - Authorization for appointment or assignment of a teacher to provide instructional support services
§ 80-5.22 - Transitional G certificate for career changers and others holding a baccalaureate and/or graduate degree in the area of a certificate title and with at least two years of acceptable post-secondary teaching experience
§ 80-5.23 - Endorsement of certificates and recognition of comparable out-of-state school counselor education programs for service as a school counselor
§ 80-5.24 - Residency certificate
§ 80-5.25 - Transitional H certificate for school district business leaders who hold a valid New York State license and registration as a certified public accountant and have at least three years of experience as a licensed certified public accountant auditing New York State school districts, boards of cooperative educational services and/or municipalities in New York State
§ 80-5.26 - Temporary Hurricane Maria certificate for teachers displaced from Puerto Rico and/or another U.S. territory as a result of Hurricane Maria to teach in New York
§ 80-5.27 - Emergency COVID-19 certificate for candidates seeking certain certificates, extensions, and annotations
§ 80-5.28 - Transitional J classroom teaching certificate for spouses of individuals on full-time active duty with the Armed Forces whose permanent duty station is in New York State

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
